page.title: 18A NORMAL DAY
page.content: Every day I get dressed and go downstairs to breakfast. Then I pack my lunch and go to school. At the end of school I go home and watch television. On Thursday I do the same things and after school I go to Judo. On Wednesday afternoon I go to choir practice with Stephanie and on Thursday I go to ballet with Ruth. On Friday I do the same as on Monday. On Saturday I go and play with Mandy. In the holidays I play with Felicity and Caroline either on Rollerboots or bicycles amd sometimes Stephanie or Mandy or Ruth comes round to play for the day. These are only some of the things I do in a normal week. I also like reading.
